name: rss-reader
description: AI-powered RSS feed reader with automated daily fetching, article management, and intelligent Q&A

config.instructions:
üõ†Ô∏è Configuration Instructions

1. The RSS Reader requires OpenAI API key for AI-powered Q&A features
2. Add to your backend/.env file:
   - OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your_key_here

3. Features:
   - Add RSS feeds via the + Add Feed button
   - Articles are fetched automatically when you add a feed
   - Daily scheduler fetches new articles at 6 AM automatically
   - Click any article to view it with AI-generated Q&A
   - Ask follow-up questions about articles using AI

4. Supported RSS feed formats:
   - RSS 2.0
   - Atom 1.0
   - Most standard blog/news feeds

5. Example RSS feeds to try:
   - TechCrunch: https://techcrunch.com/feed/
   - Hacker News: https://hnrss.org/frontpage
   - NY Times Technology: https://rss.nytimes.com/services/xml/rss/nyt/Technology.xml

6. The scheduler runs automatically and fetches all feeds daily
7. Restart the backend server after updating .env
